name: Creamy Peach Dessert
author: Lorena Essner

ingredients.name: water or 3 c. water and 1/2 c. peach juice

instructions: Mix together graham cracker crumbs, sugar and margarine. Make crust of 1/2 mixture in 9 x 13 inch pan. Do not bake or chill. Combine pudding, Jell-O and water in sauce pan. Cook and stir over medi- um heat until mixture comes to a full boil. Pour into bowl and chill until it begins to jell. Add peaches and fold in whipped topping. Then spoon into crust and sprinkle with remaining crumbs. Chill.
